events.message: I just received my order today, but the product has several scratches and seems damaged on the surface. This is really disappointing.
The reported problem was identified as a Product Defect due to the mention of scratches and damages on the item.
Support agent Alex has been assigned to handle this case regarding the reported damaged product.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about the scratches on your product. I’m here to help you resolve this issue.
Could you please send us some clear photos of the scratches and any damage? This will help us assess the problem quickly.
I’ve attached several photos showing the scratches and damage on the product. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product shipped immediately or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know your choice.
I would like to receive a replacement instead of a refund, thank you for the quick response and options.
The replacement order has been placed and will be shipped within 24 hours. We will send tracking details as soon as it’s dispatched.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement product and that everything is in perfect condition now.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and it’s in perfect condition. Thanks again for the prompt help.
We are closing this case now as the issue has been resolved to your satisfaction. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance.
